original_title: Leonard Cohen: I'm Your Man, From Montreal to the World
overview: A rare collection of National Film Board of Canada movies focusing on poet, singer and songwriter Leonard Cohen, presented by Jane McGarrigle, one of the most emblematic figures of Montreal's cultural scene and with on-screen comments from friends, family and collaborators. This eclectic set includes an informal documentary about the young Cohen in 1965, as we see him reading poems, chatting with friends, and even taking a bath!
tagline: "There is a crack in everything, thatâ€™s how the light gets in"
title: Leonard Cohen: I'm Your Man, From Montreal to the World
